Title: Murder Under the Mistletoe
Writer: Elizabeth Coleman, Kerry Greenwood (novel), Jo Kasch (additional story editor)
Actors: Essie Davis, Nathan Page, Hugo Johnstone-Burt, Ashleigh Cummings
Plot: Christmas in July turns deadly when the ghosts of an old Christmas mine collapse come back to haunt Aunt Prudence. Trapped by heavy snowfall in a house with a murderer means failing to solve the case could cost them their lives.
